main.name: Full-Stack Developer
main.description: With a vast array of knowledge in many different Front-End and Back-End languages, responsive frameworks, databases, and best practices.
main.bio: My name is Brian Ford and I have been a Full-Stack Developer for three years. my objective is to simply be the best developer I can be and to contribute to the technology industry all that I know and can do. I am dedicated to perfecting my craft by learning from more seasoned developers, remaining humble, and continuously making strides to learn all that I can about development.
